title: Datepicker
text: As a Jira User, I want to have an inline help for the datepicker, so that I can learn how to use such a complex component.

title: Confluence User Management
text: As a Confluence User, I want to have an extra modal to remove users from a group, so that i can also select users not present in the group, just in case.

title: Confluence Page Naming
text: As a Confluence User, I want a Confluence page name to be unique within a space, so that I can improve my creativity in naming pages.

title: Github Large PRs
text: As a Github User, I want to have all the files in a PR to be loaded at once rather than fast, so that i can review the PR on the horizontal Screens at Time Square.
